#summary Array prototype eases array manipulation.
#labels Phase-Implementation

== About ==
Array is a static prototype that wraps methods for arrays. LEAF does not change the native Array prototype, since this could impact in other libs and works.

----
== Methods ==
|| *Name* || *Arguments* || *Return* || *Description* ||
||each||Array, Function||void||Calls the function to handle each array item. The function will receive as argument: item, index; and any "this" inside function will be a pointer to the iterated array.||
